summary: Mephedrone is a man-made drug that acts like a mix of other stimulants, such as MDMA and cocaine. It can be found in pill or crystal form and is often taken by swallowing, snorting, or injecting. The drug was first made in 1929 but gained popularity in the early 2000s, especially in the UK. Due to its harmful effects, many countries have made it illegal. In the United States, it was classified as a Schedule I drug (the most restrictive category) in 2012.
title: Mephedrone
